content: Generate an image of turtle curled up in a ball. Include the image of the turtle loaf to make them as consistent as possible

Here's the generated image of Turtle curled up in a ball. It follows the ultra-minimal style with clean black lines on white, closed eyes for sleeping, and a nice round curled-up shape. The style is fairly consistent with the loaf reference - same minimal line approach, though the eyes are curved lines (closed) rather than dots.

A few notes:
- The ears are slightly more pointed/angular than the rounder loaf reference
- The nose uses small curved lines rather than a single dot
- The tail wraps around nicely to complete the ball shape

Would you like me to regenerate with any adjustments, or would you like me to convert this to SVG?
